paragraph.heading:
A. cornifolius (Boiss. & Hohen.) Alijanpoor
,
var. cornifolius

subSubSection.paragraph:
Syn.:
Rhamnus .
cornifolia Boissier & Hohenacker var. velutina Bornmüller (1905: 225)
.
Description —Plant densely pubescent on branches, leaves, petioles and stipules; leaves almost ovoid to elliptic.
Habitat and distribution — IRAN , IRAQ and TURKEY .

The species grows in Markazi , Isphahan , Kurdistan , Azerbaijan and Kohgiluyeh and Boyer-Ahmad Provinces in C & W of Iran , at an altitude of
2300–3700 m
, between 32° and 35° N and between 44° and 50° E on the Southern slopes of cliffs. The distributions of this taxon tends to be restricted, due to a decrease in habitats
.
Phenology —Flowering is in early April to early May, fruits and seeds maturie in early July to late August.
